pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Golda Meir Library, University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Papers of a prominent Milwaukee Polish announcer for WISN and WRJN and host of The Kuryer Polski Polish Hour. Includes scripts describing his visits to Poland, holiday broadcasts and to commemorate the deaths of Franklin D. Roosevelt and John F. and Robert Kennedy. Also includes correspondence, photographs and biographical information and background information on WRJN.
